verses.text: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w any|strong="H0176"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* swearing, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w either|strong="H0518"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* privy \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w do|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* utter \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

Whosoever toucheth \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, \w either|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* killed \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w died|strong="H5038"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w itself|strong="H1931"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* creeping \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*: \w and|strong="H1697"\w* forgetteth \w his|strong="H3605"\w* uncleanness, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* hath offended:

\w And|strong="H0120"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w according|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* wherewith \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* wont \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w having|strong="H3588"\w* forgotten \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w come|strong="H5060"\w* afterwards \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* offence.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* sweareth, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* uttereth \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H3190"\w* \w either|strong="H4480"\w* \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* bindeth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* word, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w having|strong="H5315"\w* forgotten \w it|strong="H1931"\w* afterwards understandeth \w his|strong="H3605"\w* offence,
\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* do penance \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* offer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* ewe \w lamb|strong="H3776"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* pray \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*:

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* offer \w a|strong="H0176"\w* beast, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* offer \w two|strong="H8147"\w* turtles, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* holocaust,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* twist \w back|strong="H6203"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* little pinions, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* stick \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w neck|strong="H6203"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* altogether broken \w off|strong="H4454"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* sprinkle \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w side|strong="H7023"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* whatsoever \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* let \w it|strong="H1931"\w* drop \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bottom thereof, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* burn \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* holocaust, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* wont \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* pray \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w offer|strong="H5414"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* turtles, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w offer|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w part|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* ephi \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*. \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* \w thereon|strong="H5921"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* deliver \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w handful|strong="H7062"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w memorial|strong="H0234"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w offered|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*:

Praying \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* making \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w*: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H1961"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* himself \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w gift|strong="H4503"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w mistake|strong="H7684"\w*, transgressing \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ceremonies \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* sacrificed \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* offer \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* offence \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* bought \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w two|strong="H4480"\w* sicles, \w according|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* weight \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* good \w the|strong="H0853"\w* damage itself \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w done|strong="H3254"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w part|strong="H4480"\w* \w besides|strong="H5921"\w*, delivering \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* pray \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3254"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w through|strong="H3605"\w* ignorance, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* forbidden, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w being|strong="H5315"\w* \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*,

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* offer \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* hocks \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* measure \w and|strong="H0935"\w* estimation \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sin|strong="H0817"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* pray \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* ignorantly: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w forgiven|strong="H5545"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*,
Because \w by|strong="H3068"\w* mistake \w he|strong="H1931"\w* trespassed against \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
